thread.title: Here’s How Taimur Has Changed Kareena Kapoor’s Life Post Her Pregnancy
thread.title_full: Here’s How Taimur Has Changed Kareena Kapoor’s Life Post Her Pregnancy

author: Divya Rao
title: Here’s How Taimur Has Changed Kareena Kapoor’s Life Post Her Pregnancy
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 15 . 2017 Kareena Kapoor 
Kareena Kapoor will go down in history as one of those women who’ve made pregnancy cool in India – from flaunting her baby bump to walking the ramp just months after her delivery. She is one cool woman. Kareena did a Facebook live with celebrity dietician Rujuta Diwekar, where she revealed that she plans to eat clean and workout religiously to lose that post-pregnancy weight. 
What’s interesting is that she spoke about how Taimur has changed her routine and is forcing her to get fit again because he loves being carried around. 
I walk a lot. My son cries if I sit with him in my arms. It is his way of telling me to walk a lot. He is keeping me on the toes already. I am happy he loves walking already. 
Haha. Looks like this kid is going to be quite the fitness freak himself when he grows up if he already loves walking! 11
